title: Ten people stand trial in Paris for online harassment of Brigitte Macron
subhead: France's first lady has long been the target of disinformation. Ten defendants went on trial in a Paris court on Monday over online harassment of Brigitte Macron.

title: Zohran Mamdani leads New York mayoral race, rattling Democratic establishment
subhead: A week before the vote, the self-proclaimed socialist leads the polls after a savvy campaign on the cost of living. But his stance to the left of the party unsettles even his own camp, while questions linger over the funding of his social platform.

title: Mouhamadou Fall, first French athlete to join Enhanced Games: 'For me, it's not doping, but a chance to learn more about the human body's limits'
subhead: The French sprinter announced Thursday that he has signed up for the Enhanced Games, an event where doping is permitted – even encouraged. In an interview with Le Monde, the multiple French champion in the 100 m and 200 m explains his decision.
